dublin_core.dcvalue: Wired Mothers links pregnant women with their primary health providers thru a mobile phone application. Women receive appointment reminders, educational messaging and direct access to call their primary care providers to discuss non-acute issues.
Boudewijn Peters, Danida Health Sector Program Support, Email:boudewijn.peters@gmail.com | Maryam Hemed, Zanzibar Ministry of Health, Tel: +251927361823, Email: hemed32@yahoo.com
Client education and behavior change communication, Maternal Health, Newborn Health
